title: Peter Lynch doesn’t own AI stocks. OpenAI’s crazy new deal shows why
description: The latest agreement between Sam Altman’s firm and chipmaker AMD is yet another mind-bending example of the circular artificial intelligence economy.
content:
Peter Lynch is a genuine icon of investing, and not just for the fact he delivered an annual average return of almost 30 per cent during his 13 years managing the Magellan Fund at Fidelity until 1990.

title: Indian Army Enhances Technological Capabilities, Proves AI Prowess In Operation Sindoor
description: The Indian Army has successfully integrated Artificial Intelligence (AI) into its core functions, showcasing its effectiveness during Operation Sindoor.
content:
New Delhi: A senior Indian Army officer on Monday said the force has already begun integrating AI into its core functions, and its effectiveness was demonstrated during Operation Sindoor.

title: India’s Well-heeled Get Their AI Kicks from Secondary Market
description: Indias affluent are chasing the worlds hottest trade — artificial intelligence. The desire to jump on to the AI bandwagon is so strong that they are venturing beyond Wall Street into the unlisted space.

title: The AI Suicide Problem Knows No Borders
description: How are Chinese artificial intelligence developers protecting their most vulnerable users? A string of dystopian headlines in the US about suicide and youth mental health has put mounting pressure on Silicon Valley, but we’re not seeing a similar wave of cases in China. Initial testing suggests that they may be doing something right, although it’s just as likely such cases would never see the light of day in China’s tightly controlled media environment.
content: (Bloomberg Opinion) -- How are Chinese artificial intelligence developers protecting their most vulnerable users? A string of dystopian headlines in the US about suicide and youth mental health has put mounting pressure on Silicon Valley, but we’re n... [5298 chars]

title: With AI help, hit Pak assets with 94% accuracy in Op Sindoor: Army
description: Historical data of 26 years processed through artificial intelligence (AI) provided the Army accurate information on the Pakistan Army’s movement during Operation Sindoor and aided it in pinpoint targeting.

title: CoreWeave plans to acquire Monolith AI to strengthen its industrial position
description: CoreWeave (CRWV) announced it plans to acquire Monolith AI, a U.K.-based software firm that uses artificial intelligence to enable machine learning for engineering and physics, to help strengthen its position in industrial sectors.
